summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the Dance Diffusion audio generation pipeline, covering fast unit checks (component initialization, attention slicing, deterministic results, output format, batch vs single inference consistency, checkpoint serialization) and full integration validations of end‑to‑end generation in both standard and half‑precision modes.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, correctness, and performance of the Dance Diffusion audio generation service, enabling confident deployment and user satisfaction by detecting regressions and ensuring consistent behavior across configurations.
